platform.model

Class Cluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.model.PlatformComponentProp
      • platform.model.Cluster

  • public class Cluster
extends PlatformComponentProp
    Represents a cluster in the platform. The cluster is composed of memories, processors, links, DMAs.
    Author:
    Pranav Tendulkar

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Number of memories inside the cluster.
      private int numProcessorsInCluster
      Number of processors inside the cluster.

      Processors of the cluster.
      private int speed
      Speed of the cluster.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cluster

        public Cluster(java.lang.String name,
       int id,
       int speed,
       int numProcessorsInThisCluster,
       int numberOfLinksToThisCluster,
       int numClusterMemory,
       int numDmaEngines)
        Initialize the cluster component of the platform model.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the cluster
        id - id of the cluster
        speed - speed of the cluster
        numProcessorsInThisCluster - number of processors present in the cluster
        numberOfLinksToThisCluster - number of links connected to the cluster
        numClusterMemory - number of memories present in the cluster
        numDmaEngines - number of DMA present in the cluster
